org.fcrepo.kernel.api.utils

Class ContentDigest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.api.utils.ContentDigest

  • public final class ContentDigest
extends Object
    Digest helpers to convert digests (checksums) into URI strings (based loosely on Magnet URIs)
    Since:
    Mar 6, 2013
    Author:
    Chris Beer
